name: Image to Video
description: Transform static images into dynamic videos with AI-generated motion
prompt: Create a video from the uploaded image with the following motion: {{motion_type}}. Duration: {{duration}} seconds. Style: {{style}}. Motion intensity: {{intensity}}. Additional instructions: {{additional_prompt}}

fields.name: image
fields.label: Source Image
fields.description: Upload the image you want to animate

fields.name: motion_type
fields.label: Motion Type
fields.description: Choose the type of motion to apply

fields.name: intensity
fields.label: Motion Intensity
fields.description: How strong the motion effect should be

fields.name: style
fields.label: Video Style
fields.description: Overall style of the generated video

fields.name: additional_prompt
fields.label: Additional Instructions
fields.placeholder: Any specific motion or style instructions...
fields.description: Optional: Provide specific instructions for the animation
